name: Kyoto 437 (MVP)
description:
Note: This game was made for the Basic Block Jam. It's a minimum viable product and will eventually be released under the Astrojone account. 

Please join our Discord for more retro game making.

Kyoto 347 is an MS-DOS Code Page 437-styled ASCII adventure game made for the Basic Block Jam. It was made from scratch in approximately two days.

Features: 

  • Multiple endings. 
  • MS-DOS graphics.
  • Adlib music. 
  • PC Speaker sound effects. 

Credits: 

  • quackgyver - production
  • Polyducks - graphics 
  • Jake Milner - writing 
  • Robyn - music 
  • des - testing

Recommended system specifications:

  • A contemporary HTML5-enabled web browser. 
  • 1280x768px or higher resolution. 
  • Keyboard. 
  • Sound card.
